Depression is tough. Yesterday I went from a hanging out with friends & feeling great. To coming home & crashing real hard without understanding why. 

Now today I feel like I'm operating in a fog. It will pass, just in this moment, it's not great.
Also it was pretty weird to discover that my regular depression is clinically classed as major depression from reading the product page of my new antidepressants
